result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Donald Emanuel Miller

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Violation Report forwarded to Judge for review and filed.

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Donald Emanuel Miller.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. Case set for calendar call.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a Bench Warrant to be issued forthwith. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.
JusticePoint PreTrial Services Supervision Report dated 10-19-2022; received and filed.

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller not in court.  Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court for Donald Emanuel Miller.  Prosecuting attorney M Samir Siddique in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defendant failing to appear.  Defense counsel requests that the Court impose and stay a warrant.  State has no objection. Court ordered a bench warrant issued but stayed the issuance until next court date.
Calendar call scheduled for October 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Donald Emanuel Miller not in court, in custody.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.
Case in court for status conference.  Defense counsel has received discovery and offer and requests projected guilty plea and sentencing hearing.
Case remains calendared in Branch 30.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 14, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes and Theodore Kafkas appearing as a friend of the court. Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in custody.  Sarah Dahdouh appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court on defense motion to modify bail. Bail/bond hearing proceeded.   Arguments heard by defense and the State. Court DENIED defense bail motion for reasons placed on the record.
Case adjourned.  Status conference scheduled for August 22, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Motion to Modify Bail, received and filed
Defendant advised No Contact Order remains in full force and effect.  Defendant to have no violent contact with KIH and KMG. Defendant to have absolutely not contact with ALB.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

02:43 PM Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in court with Student Intern Ted Kafkas under the supervision of Attorney Meera L Al-Henaey. Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in custody.  Arthur Kenneth Thexton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donald Emanuel Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  
 This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion: https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/76b667a0-98a1-69d4-e783-9185dc35fcc1  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court. Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller not in court.  Erika Strebel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
HEARING HELD VIA ZOOM/LIVE STREAMING THROUGH DACAST.  Case in court for a scheduling conference. 
DEFENDANT FAILED TO APPEAR. Defense counsel advises the court he has been unsuccessful in contacting client.  State requests a warrant to be issued and to forfeit the bail. 
Court ordered bench warrant issued, remand to Commissioner, and no action on bail.
Justice Point Pretrial Services DISCHARGE Report received and filed.
Justice Point Violation (Missed Office Contact) Report
Proposed No Contact Order & Firearm Prohibition_1 - Hendon, Kevonna I.docx

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.
All previous bail conditions are to remain

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in court with attorney Edgar A Beltran.  Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in custody.  Sara Waldschmidt-DeSmet appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Violation (Discharge - Bench Warrant) Report received and filed.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case in court for Calendar Call.  Defendant failing to appear, Court lifted the stay of the Bench Warrant. Statements made by Ab, MB, and KG. Court vacates the jury trial. COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT. Court takes no action as to bail. 
State requests a bail forfeiture at the future court date.
JusticePoint Supervision Report, filed.
JusticePoint Status Report, filed.

Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Matter scheduled for Bail Hearing.  Defendant's appeareance waived for today's court date.  Victim appeared by zoom.
Defendant is in treatment.  Court requests defense counsel to provide proof of treatment and timeframe of release.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 30.  Status conference scheduled for April 1, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for May 13, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant to have NO VIOLENT contact with KIH and KMG.
Defendant to have ABSOLUTELY NO CONTACT with ALB.

Court orders defendant to get a mental health evaluation and any recommended treatment within 2 weeks.
Defendant is to remain compliant of mental health treatment.

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in court with attorney Michael V Fuentes.  Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donald Emanuel Miller appeared by video means.     
Case in court for a Bail/bond hearing. Statements made by KIH and KMG. Bail motion by defense argued and granted by the Court.  Case remains calendared in Br. 30.  Bail/Bond Review scheduled for March 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:45 AM Attorney Michael V Fuentes in court, defendant Donald Emanuel Miller not in court, in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appear via zoom. Deputy Court Clerk: STW
CASE HELD VIA ZOOM AND LIVE STREAM ON DA CAST. Case set for Status Conference, defense request to be heard as to bail. Statements made by KH and KG.  Bail motion by Defense argued and DENIED by the Court. Court request additional information regarding treatment. Case adjourned, Branch 30.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for March 4, 2022 at 08:30 am.
filed.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 4.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with KIH

Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in court with attorney Brett Lee Copeland.  Defendant Donald Emanuel Miller in custody.  Grace M. Gall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Donald Emanuel Miller appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Richards, Branch 30.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Status conference scheduled for February 25, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
